testcase.name: ACT Round2 Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given valid registered email and password in 1 row..........................passed And clicked on SignIn.......................................................passed Then login should be successfull............................................passed When clicked My addresses...................................................passed Then addresses page should be navigated successfully........................passed When clicked Add New Addresses..............................................passed Then Add address pages should be displayed..................................passed When user fills all fields from 1 with new data and click on save...........passed Then my address page should be displayed....................................passed When clicked on women and selected summer dresses...........................passed Then summer dresses page should be opened...................................passed Then change view to list view...............................................passed And add 3 items to cart.....................................................passed When clicked on checkout....................................................passed Then order page should be opened............................................passed Then complete the order.....................................................passed When clicked on username....................................................passed Then acoount details should be opened.......................................passed When clicked order history and details......................................passed Then order history should be displayed......................................passed When clicked sign out.......................................................passed Then signIn home page should be displayed...................................passed
